adHeader: Small business start up seeking data entry jobs
adDetails: Hi there, We are a small business based out of our home office in Burlingame. Right now, we have a couple data entry gigs going with various companies around the Bay Area. We create invoices, timesheets, etc. We also have clients, (realtors, doctors, etc) who we do various data entry jobs for. Also, if you are looking for a temporary position for data entry for an upcoming event, please contact us! We have years of experience and have worked jobs for big companies such as Cisco, Barclay Capital, etc. We are experienced in the following programs: -Quickbooks -Excel -Word -Outlook -Powerpoint -Turbo Tax and more. There is no job to big or too small and we offer a great hourly rate! All of our references will tell you that we're efficient and get the job done right. Please respond to the email above and we will get back to you quickly. Thanks!
